name: Cascadia Kush
description: Cascadia Kush is an 80/20 indica bred by Hesperides Gardens in Washington. It combines Alien Kush and Frankenstein genetics to create a powerhouse of relaxing, pain-relieving effects. Cascadia Kush took the award for Best Indica at the 2015 DOPE Cup in Seattle.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Tingly, Sleepy, Happy, Depression, Pain, Stress, Headaches, Insomnia, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Headache
